name: Slidemotion
tag_list: video-free, video, video-with-music, movie-maker, slideshow, photo-slideshow, photo-editor, make-a-video, slideshow-with-music, slidemotion
overview:
Slidemotion is an automated web service that makes high-end video production super easy. With Slidemotion users are able to create professional looking videos from photos, video clips and music in just a few clicks.

Slidemotion founders beleive only exciting and engaging story can truly touch the hearts of friends, family or business partners and video is by far the most appropriate media for this. Video feels natural (we use sight, motion and sound to observe world around us), it is viral by its very nature and, combined with music, it triggers emotions. Slidemotion claims it provides a simple-to-use online application to make this happen.

Founded in Nov 2010, Slidemotion was finalist of the Seedcamp Ljubljana 2011 startup competition.
